title: PBE help
body: When i can sign up PBE ?

replies.body: For the time being, [**PBE Signups**](http://status.pbe.leagueoflegends.com/#pbe) are indefinitely closed for maintenance. I don't quite yet have a date for when they'll open back up, but you can be sure to know by checking the status page or [**news page**](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news).
